title: Immutability
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: immutability-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0079
	- preferred-term:: Immutability
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: Tamper-resistant property within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
	- source:: [[ISO/IEC 23257:2021]], [[IEEE 2418.1]], [[NIST NISTIR]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:Immutability
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- belongsToDomain:: [[CryptographicDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: immutability-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Blockchain]]
		- bridges-to:: [[Networkcomponent]]
		- bridges-to:: [[BlockchainEntity]]

ontology.definition: Tamper-resistant property within blockchain systems, providing essential functionality for distributed ledger technology operations and properties.
